txt.en: 'The Hall of Thorin is not so grand as the glittering walls of Khazad-d√ªm but they are home for now.'
'The warm rivers of light and pools of shadow, the echoing halls and vaulting ceilings...truly the homes of my kin are the greatest.'
'Make no trouble here, and you will find none.'
'A word of warning: never cause strife with a dwarf!'
